thread.title: Brooke Greathead
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Brooke Greathead

author: Brooke Greathead
title: Brooke Greathead
text: My friend has been doing Kayla's Bikini Body Workouts for the last year and she looks amazing!! I've been wanting to purchase this program, but was unsure if I wanted to pay full price. Today I was so happy to finally purchase the Bikini Body Guide for a fraction of the cost. I purchased it 80% off and within minutes, the guides were e-mailed to me. I've been looking through the exercises and food guide and I'm so excited to start the program tomorrow morning. Thanks Kayla for offering such a fantastic deal!!!
